articles.title: Verstappen takes US F1 Sprint win ahead of Hamilton - Racingnews365.com
articles.description: Max Verstappen came out on top at the F1 Sprint from the Circuit of the Americas.
articles.content:
Max Verstappen has won the sprint race from the Circuit of the Americas, converting his pole position into victory.
Verstappen was challenged by Ferraris Charles Leclerc into the first corner howeve… [+1506 chars]

articles.title: Campus surveillance: students and professors decry sensors in buildings - Nature.com
articles.description: Privacy campaigners fear that the devices could be used for disciplinary purposes, and some universities have deactivated them after protests.
